summary: An ordinance canceling the certificate of purchase issued against lots 7 and 8, block 101, D. T. Denny's 5th Addition for the condemnation of Westlake Avenue under Ordinance No. 12023 refunding the purchase price thereof authorizing the drawing of warrants for said purchase price and appropriating the sum of $53.90 from the special under Ordinance No. and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof. Of said condemnation and 20 cents from the general fund for said purpose.
